descp2: int, RandomState instance or None (default=0) Determines random number generation for dataset shuffling. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See :term:`Glossary <random_state>`.

int, RandomState instance or None (default=0) Determines random number generation for dataset shuffling. Pass an int for reproducible output across multiple function calls. See :term:`Glossary <random_state>`.
